thread.title: Mark Zuckerberg's visit to Alabama fuels political intrigue in city where Trump ruled
thread.title_full: Mark Zuckerberg's visit to Alabama fuels political intrigue in city where Trump ruled

author: John Sharp | jsharp@al.com
title: Mark Zuckerberg's visit to Alabama fuels political intrigue in city where Trump ruled
text: Zuckerberg spent Sunday in Mobile and Bayou La Batre as part of a lunch of his U.S. tour. The visit to Mobile occurred in the same city where President Donald Turmp's 2015 rally solidified himself as a worthy candidate, and in the city that is home to one of Zuckerberg's fiercest critics, Jeff Sessions. It also comes a mere days after the release of a "manifesto" that some say is a swipe at Trump's America-first policies.
